alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 11:29AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clinton and northeastern Essex Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1127 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Au Sable Forks, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Slow moving storms with very heavy rainfall rates. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain may result in ponding on roadways. Locations impacted include... Peru, Keeseville, Port Kent, Lewis, Corlaer Bay, Ausable Chasm, Deerhead, Harkness, Clintonville and Port Douglass. This includes Interstate 87 between mile markers 124 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton; Western Essex
